name: Only Hero
description:
You are the Only Hero, the last line of defense between the city and destruction. With dangers coming from all sides, you can be in only one place at a time. Do your best to hold off the cities destruction for as long as possible.

How To Play:

  • Mouse Around to Fly
  • You are immortal, but the city is not. Fly over threats to remove them before to much destruction has befallen the city

Credits:

  • Art, Design & Code from RyanLewisDesign
  • Music and Sounds from Austin Norman

This game was made for GMTK 2019.
